page.title: 08EMPLOYMENT:BAD'HAM/DENN'TON
page.content: The ratio of those who are in full time employment to those who are retired is 1:1. In Dennington the number of retired exceeds full time workers by the same ratio. 26% of retired people lived elsewhere before retirement. Nearly half as many people have part time jobs as are in full time employment. Of all workers 32% are employed in agriculture; 23% are self-employed; 24% work within 1 mile of home; 48% between 1 & 10 miles and 28% over 10 miles. Twice as many people in Badingham compared to Dennington work over 10 miles from home.
